name: Covid-19 Invaders
description:
--------------------- Demo version (3 mini-levels) at the top ------------------------

5 January 2020

WHO reports on pneumonia of unknown cause in your country.

Doctor X, you are in charge of fighting the outbreak of the epidemic.

Best Regards

World Health Organization

Defend your hospitals from the viruses!

CONTENTS

5 Chapters

15 Levels

3 Modes (Easy, Normal, Hard)

COMMANDS

Use A/D or Arrows to move. Left click or AltR to shoot, Right click or AltL for secondary weapon.


Created  by:
Clockwise333 - Code & Game-Dev
Laura Seclì - Art
Alessandro Marazzi - Music & Sounds
